Description: Foot sherd of large Attic black-glazed pottery kylix; glazed save for rounded outer edge of foot and resting surface; inscription cut on underside.
Curator's comments: Published by A. Johnston, 'Trading families?', in R. Catling (ed.), Onomatologos (Essays in Honour of Elaine Matthews), Oxford 2010, 470-1 fig. 1a-b.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 510)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GA.1479)
